document.full_text: anadigics inc  forecast a challenging year ahead and cut 10 percent jobs as its largest customer research in motion   shifted orders to the chipset maker's rivals, sending its shares down 10 percent to an eight-month low.
document.title: anadigics sees tough 2011 as rivals chip away
lines_and_colors: anadigics inc  forecast a challenging year ahead and cut 10 percent jobs as its largest customer research in motion   shifted orders to the chipset maker's rivals, sending its shares down 10 percent to an eight-month low.
